comments.author: aionescu@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9142632
Screenshot from 2020-04-23 09-56-27.png

The search results in *Tests* box should refresh when changing the search filters in the dropdowns. Currently, the search results are updating only when the text search is modified.
comments.raw_text: The search results in *Tests* box should refresh when changing the search filters in the dropdowns. Currently, the search results are updating only when the text search is modified.

comments.creator: aionescu@mozilla.com
comments.author: aionescu@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Hi Sarah. How are you?
[This code](https://github.com/mozilla/treeherder/blob/master/ui/perfherder/graphs/TestDataModal.jsx#L422-L428) is showing the `filteredData` only if the `filterText` is not empty, otherwise it's showing the `relatedTests` or `seriesData`. After one of the `framework`, `repository_name` or `platform` changes [`updateFilterText`](https://github.com/mozilla/treeherder/blob/master/ui/perfherder/graphs/TestDataModal.jsx#L256-L267) is never invoked again. Is calling it at the end of [`async processOptions`](https://github.com/mozilla/treeherder/blob/master/ui/perfherder/graphs/TestDataModal.jsx#L212-L252) a viable solution? I tried but it didn't work for some rerason. I assume because of `async/await`. Any quick thoughts? Thanks.
comments.text:
Hi Sarah. How are you?
[This code](https://github.com/mozilla/treeherder/blob/master/ui/perfherder/graphs/TestDataModal.jsx#L422-L428) is showing the `filteredData` only if the `filterText` is not empty, otherwise it's showing the `relatedTests` or `seriesData`. After one of the `framework`, `repository_name` or `platform` changes [`updateFilterText`](https://github.com/mozilla/treeherder/blob/master/ui/perfherder/graphs/TestDataModal.jsx#L256-L267) is never invoked again. Is calling it at the end of [`async processOptions`](https://github.com/mozilla/treeherder/blob/master/ui/perfherder/graphs/TestDataModal.jsx#L212-L252) a viable solution? I tried but it didn't work for some rerason. I assume because of `async/await`. Any quick thoughts? Thanks.

comments.raw_text: Can you open a pr as a WIP? I last worked on this part of the codebase 6 months ago so Ionut might be a better person to ask (he worked on it back in January).
